headline: FirstEnergy Awarded $50 Million Smart Grid Grant by U.S. Department of Energy
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) has been awarded $50 million in federal funding by the U.S. Department of Energy's Grid Deployment Office for projects that will enhance electric service reliability for more than 53,000 Mon Power and Potomac Edison customers in West Virginia and Maryland. The funding is part of the Grid Resilience and Innovation Partnerships (GRIP) Program established by the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law.
